nodes.bodyText: It's probably enough to just return Map<Long, Long>
We could refactor this to a separate check?
as above, it may be easier to pass in Map<Long, Long>
nit: could we name this with what the autobatcher actually does? i.e. cellPutter or something like that
How does this case arise? Might be worth a comment: it's not obvious how this happens
Probably worth defensively logging what the exception is
Added a comment and logging the exception.
possible race condition here in that concurrentHashMap may have extra entries cleared, but this is OK as this is only used to skip reads for values that are about to be written
nit: would suggest renaming, maybe to createNamespaceAndConstructCacheProposal since this has side effects
